instruction: Compare the ingredients in two recipes and list out the differences.
input:
Recipe A: 2 cups of flour, 1/2 cup of  butter, 1 teaspoon of baking powder 
Recipe B: 1 cup of flour, 1 teaspoon of baking soda
output: Recipe A contains 2 cups of flour, 1/2 cup of butter and 1 teaspoon of baking powder while Recipe B contains 1 cup of flour and 1 teaspoon of baking soda. Recipe A has an extra 1/2 cup of butter compared to Recipe B.
